Uses of Package
com.sap.conn.idoc

  • Packages that use com.sap.conn.idoc 
    Package Description
    com.sap.conn.idoc
    Contains the major part of the interfaces, classes and factories that an IDoc processing application is typically dealing with.
    com.sap.conn.idoc.jco
    Contains the main factory class JCoIDoc and all JCo related interfaces of the SAP Java IDoc Library.
  • Classes in com.sap.conn.idoc used by com.sap.conn.idoc 
    Class and Description
    IDocConversionException
    Special IDoc conversion exception class.
    IDocDatatype
    Enumeration of different datatypes of an IDoc field element.
    IDocDocument
    Interface that represents an IDoc.
    IDocDocumentIterator
    Interface for iterating over a sequence of documents.
    IDocDocumentList
    Interface that serves as a container for storing and managing a list of documents of the same kind (also known as IDoc package).
    IDocElementException
    Special IDoc exception class that may additionally hold a reference to an IDoc element where the exception occurred.
    IDocException
    General IDoc exception class.
    IDocFieldNotFoundException
    Special IDoc field not found exception class.
    IDocIllegalTypeException
    Special IDoc exception class indicating an illegal type error.
    IDocMetaDataUnavailableException
    Special IDoc exception class indicating that some necessary IDoc meta data information is not available.
    IDocParseException
    Special IDoc exception class indicating an error when parsing an IDoc XML data stream.
    IDocRecord
    Interface that serves as a basic instance for accessing structured IDoc data elements.
    IDocRecordMetaData
    Interface that stores meta data for an IDoc record.
    IDocRepository
    Repository interface providing IDoc meta information.
    IDocRuntimeException
    General IDoc runtime exception class.
    IDocSegment
    Interface that represents a single IDoc segment.
    IDocSegmentIterator
    Interface for iterating over a sequence of segments.
    IDocSegmentIterator.Type 
    IDocSegmentMetaData
    Interface to access to all meta data of a segment instance.
    IDocSyntaxException
    Special IDoc syntax exception class.
    IDocTraceListener
    IDocLibrary trace listener interface.
    IDocXMLFormat
    Enumeration type of IDoc XML formats.
    IDocXMLProcessor
    General interface offering functionality for parsing and rendering IDoc-XML data.
  • Classes in com.sap.conn.idoc used by com.sap.conn.idoc.jco 
    Class and Description
    IDocDocument
    Interface that represents an IDoc.
    IDocDocumentList
    Interface that serves as a container for storing and managing a list of documents of the same kind (also known as IDoc package).
    IDocFactory
    Central IDoc factory interface.
    IDocRepository
    Repository interface providing IDoc meta information.
    IDocRuntimeException
    General IDoc runtime exception class.
